UPDATE.LOG:
llvm12: Disable LLDB on non-x86 architectures
The 12.0.0 branch point hit point in the rework of FreeBSD debug targets were non-x86 architectures are broken. For now, simply disable LLDB builds on those platforms.
PR: 254082 (cherry picked from commit cc0bbd86088c545607a8585256adb8e3cfb132ad)

COMMIT.Subject: llvm12: Disable LLDB on non-x86 architectures
